affects:

AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
cmb:
MANA COST: 140
COOLDOWN: 13
desc: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units.
notes: Storm Hammer can only be disjointed by going invisible.
lore: The Rogue Knight's iron gauntlet, taken from the school of his father, strikes his foes to their core.
name: sven_storm_bolt

desc: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.
notes:
Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.
Cleave damage goes through magic immunity.
The cleave damages a circular area in front of Sven.
lore: The Vigil Knights still seek to reclaim the stolen Outcast Blade from Sven, a weapon capable of cutting wide swaths through lesser warriors.
name: sven_great_cleave

attrib:
BONUS ARMOR: 4 / 8 / 12 / 16
BONUS SPEED: 12%
RADIUS: 900
cmb:
MANA COST: 25/25/25/25
COOLDOWN: 32/26/20/14
desc: Sven's Warcry heartens his allies for battle, increasing their movement speed and armor.  Lasts 8 seconds.
notes: Fully stacks with other armor and speed granting abilities.
lore: Calling a few lines from the Vigil Codex fortifies Sven's obedience to his rogue code. So poetic!
name: sven_warcry

attrib:
BONUS DAMAGE: 100% / 150% / 200%
SCEPTER ALLY AURA RADIUS: 900
SCEPTER ALLY BONUS DAMAGE: 50% / 75% / 100%
cmb:
MANA COST: 100/150/200
COOLDOWN: 80
desc:
Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage for 25 seconds.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes: The bonus damage is based on base damage and the primary attribute of Sven.
lore: With the strength that shattered the Sacred Helm, the Rogue Knight stands unopposed in melee combat.
name: sven_gods_strength
